body.name: Sunzel No Front Seam Biker Shorts for Women with Pockets, Yoga Workout Gym Bike Shorts with Tummy Control
features: [The New Upgraded Sunzel Blossomy Collection]: Made of a flexible material that improves mobility when working out. Extra support is provided by the high waist, and muscle control is made possible by the smooth, silky fabric.

[No Front Seam Biker Shorts with Pockets]: Breathable, buttery soft, four way stretch fabric, provide lasting comfort and sweat-wicking coverage. Sunzel has options with a 3- or 5-inch short inseam and a 8- or 10-inch knee length long inseam, depending on the style you’re looking for.
[Must-Have Features]: They don’t ride up, naked feeling, non see-through, side pockets, squat proof, tummy control, high waisted, seamless waistband, compression and super stretchy.

[Designed With Luxury And Functionality In Mind]: Pair these bike shorts with an oversized hoodie, sports bra or a cute cropped tank top to add polish to your workout outfit! These comfy bike shorts give you endless opportunities for styling and workouts.
[Womens Gym Shorts Made For]: Running, workout, athletic, yoga, fitness, excerise, walking, biking, hiking, cycling, playing volleyball, lounge or everyday casual summer wear.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Stay comfortable and stylish with Sunzel irresistibly soft biker shorts Biker Shorts for Women: Casual, Sexy and Comfortable

Buttery Soft That'll Provide Easy, Breezy Comfort! Naked Feeling Experience Comfort Beyond Imagination with Sunzel Biker Shorts V Seam Design V-seam is a unique seam located on the back of these shorts, providing a flattering fit

Sunzel Naked Feeling Crafted with the bare-feel in mind, these shorts promise a lightweight, second-skin experience that liberates you from heaviness, enabling you to glide through your yoga poses effortlessly Sunzel Double Brushed Fabric Immerse yourself in the softness of our biker shorts. The buttery soft material brings an unparalleled level of comfort, accompanying your yoga journey with tender care for your skin Sunzel High-Waist Tummy Control Designed for an empowering, sculpted look. The high-waist design securely tucks in your tummy, supporting you in managing and taming your body fat, while also enhancing your posture during yoga practice Sunzel High-Waist Hip-Lifting Tailored with a stylish high-waist, our yoga shorts offer a significant hip-lifting effect, highlighting your well-rounded buttocks. It’s more than just comfort, it’s about confidence in every move you make Sunzel Moisture-wicking Breathability Never let sweat disturb your zen moment again! These yoga shorts excel in moisture absorption and sweat expulsion, maintaining breathability for your ultimate comfort. The excellent elasticity accommodates your flexibility, allowing for seamless transitions between poses
Beat the heat with our ultra-comfortable shorts for the perfect summer practice

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Favorite workout shorts!
reviews.reviewText: I love these shorts -- I have two pairs and am going to order another! The colors are vibrant and the fabric is supper soft. These shorts are squat proof! They do roll up when working out, but I don't really mind that because my thighs eat every pair of shorts. I would suggest leaving these out to air dry to keep them from pilling. I am about 160 lbs and ordered a medium, and they fit great!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I RECEIVED THESE SHORTS AND THE FIT IS PERFECT. I LOVED THESE BIKER SHORTS. I PURCHASED MORE COLORS ALL IN A SIZE M. THIS BRAND PUT ME IN THE MIND OF SPANX, LOVE THE COMPRESSION. WHAT INSPIRED ME IS THE 90 DEGREES LEISURE WEAR. I PURCHASED SEVERAL PAIRS OF BIKER SHORTS TO WEAR UNDERNEATH MY DRESSES, WHILE AT WORK. THE COMFORT OF THESE BIKER SHORTS W/A WIDE WAISTBAND IS A HUGE PLUS, LOVE IT. THE MATERIAL AND COMFORT, QUALITY IS UNMATCHABLE W/ANY OTHER LEISURE WEAR LINE ON THE MARKET. LULULEMON IS TOO EXPENSIVE. WHEN THERE ARE OTHER LEISURE WEAR BRANDS THAT ARE AFFORDABLE AND COMFORTABLE. LADIES TRY THIS PRODUCT IT'S BREATHABLE MATERIAL, COMFORTABLE, TRENDY, AFFORDABLE, STRETCHY AND GREAT FOR ALL ACTIVITIES. HERE ARE YOUR FLOWERS 💐. GREAT JOB DESIGN TEAM 👏. I'VE DROPPED THE MIC 🎤 AND WALKED AWAY.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Tried the black 8" shorts, size small - a little tight and very brushed/thick fabric
reviews.reviewText: There are so many biker shorts on Amazon, I decided to try a bunch to really figure out what would work for me. I compared these to the Colorfulkoala Seamless Biker Shorts 8", Sunzel 10" Biker shorts, the CRZ Naked Feeling 6" Bike shorts, and the Kamo Fitness Serenity shorts, all in a size small (I'm about a 26.5" waist, 35" hip, 5'5" tall).Of all the shorts, these 8" Deep Pocket shorts are the most brushed and "stiff" feeling fabric. In the black color, they are a tiny bit tighter than all the other shorts, including a pair of Sunzel 10" bike shorts (no pockest). The fabric just doesn't feel quite as comfortable, stretchy and breathable as a lot of the other options. But I do approve of the no-front-seam and side pockets.The most flattering of all the shorts were the Kamo Fitness Serenity Shorts. The seams are all in the right places for a flattering booty and minimal camel issues. But a complete lack of pockets really kills me.Overall I preferred the CRZ Naked Feeling shorts with pockets. There is a front seam, but the fabric is stretchy enough to minimize CT and the seams are flattering. It's a smooth, sleek, breathable material. They are a 6" inseam so not ideal if you need something longer, but I did go running in them and they didn't ride up.The Colorfulkoala Seamless shorts had a thinner, brushed fabric that is good for hot weather, and no front-seam and side pockets! Also a good choice.I liked the Sunzel 10" Biker shorts more than these 8" shorts but am bummed they don't have pockets (but yes to a waistband pocket). A lightly brushed fabric but feels much more stretchy and looks very flattering.Hard to choose between all these but hopefully my notes can give you a little more clarity!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Been buying from this company for years now
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I LOVE these biker shorts.I struggle with a lot of different fabrics so finding brands that provide comfort with style is a must. Very comparable to some of Lu lu lemons shorts.The material is extremely comfortable and soft.It has enough elasticity to give a good shape without feeling restricted. It’s been hard finding form fitting shorts without the tight pressure on my stomach. So other brands I can’t wear during my period or when I’m bloated without it hurting.These shorts!!! Keep it snug without being uncomfortable tight. I can wear them no matter what my body is going through and never have a complaint.They recently switched up their design and it is even better than the last!! The pockets are higher up so it never feels like my phone is weighing my shorts down. They also changed the seem in the back to be a v shape vs a horizontal line. They are so much more flattering and even more functional.100% recommend these shorts and their joggers.I’m 5”4 128lbs and I buy the medium. I’m wearing the shorter style currently. I don’t have a problem with the shorter ones riding up either

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Comfortable and soft to the touch. Tummy control, without being too tight on belly. Provides excellent ability for movement ans not at all restricting. Great buy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Love them. BUT...
reviews.reviewText: When I first thought about buying these shorts I wanted to get the 8" inseam but they didn't have the 2 pack in black so I ended up getting the 5". These shorts are tighter in areas in which you don't want them to be tight in. The thighs roll up after doing activities and even when I sit down: same in the stomach area. They, also, are NOT squat proof and you can clearly see panty color. I also have a larger badonkey so that does not help the scenerio. I usually am able to fit in a large but seeing how the material does this I would suggest sizing up. When I first put these shorts on I also noticed some material in the thigh was loose and frilling so that's concerning because I know it will only get worse.On the other hand... I love the material. They are extremely soft and would be an amazing lounging short or low intensity workout short (yoga or pilates).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Loved these. Used them the same day they arrived for a short run with my sister in law and they were perfect. Breathable. They have pockets on both sides. They don’t ride up. Not see through and the color is very vibrant just like the picture. Will definitely be ordering more!Very stretchy fabric but with good compression where you need it. I’m also a mom of 3 and these are mommy pouch friendly 🫶🏽 Momma approved!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My daughter loves these. They are soft, not too short, and she likes the pocket on the side.

reviews.reviewTitle: Appear well made but runs way too small.
reviews.reviewText: They look and feel nice and appear well made but these are not standard American/Canadian sizing. I would order up at least two sizes if you are on the plus end of the spectrum.

Me encantaron!! Recomiendo mucho los shorts yo compre en mi talla usual y me quedaron perfectos. Si son squatproof :)!!Me quedaron un poco apretados en la parte de los cuádriceps pero la verdad no me importa mucho y las costuras si se deshacen un poco yo las corte y no e tenido ningún problema. Recomiendo bastante :)!!

La talla es correcta de acuerdo a las medidas del fabricante y llegaron a tiempo. Estos son los terceros que me compro, los anteriores compré el modelo más corto pero todos han salido de muy buena calidad, tela resistente y gruesa (no se transparentan ni los colores claros, los tengo en azul celeste) con buenas costuras y súper suavecitos, mucho mejores que opciones más caras, ajustan muy bien a la cintura sin apretar demasiado o ser incómodos y la bolsa de los lados es súper práctica para llevar el celular

reviews.reviewTitle: Soft, Stretchy and overall great bike shorts
reviews.reviewText: I genuinely like these bike shorts.Size: MediumColour: BlackQuality - These shorts are super soft to the touch and super stretchy as well. I am able to bend over/squat without my skin/underwear showing. I would personally say they are well produced with good materials from first glace and wear. I have not washed these shorts yet, so I cannot say how well they would hold up in the wash/dryer.Comparing - If you have ever owned or felt Aerie's soft leggings / shorts, I would say they are similar to the feel of those. I would even say they are probably as comfortable as lululemon's leggings.Fit - I would say these fit true to size. I got a medium and they fit like a dream. Since they are stretchy, they are a bit more forgiving. They are not "compression shorts" by any means, but they still provide support and shape. These shorts, for me personally do not ride up on my legs and do not ride down on my stomach (which is something I find a lot of high waisted bike shorts do). These are super high waisted and go probably about an 1.5inches or more above my belly button easily. These do have pockets on each side, which fit my smart phone no problem.Working out - These shorts seem to withstand sweat when working out and are super breathable. They are very easy to move around in and I don't find they dig into my skin at all. I would say they are great for working out overall.
These are AWESOME!!! Great fit with good quality material and good elasticity.Love the side pockets. They are now my go-to for walks or hikes.
